meta_description: Professional IT help for PC, Mac, tablets and mobile. Troubleshooting, virus removal, upgrades and maintenance.
meta_keywords: IT help, PC repair, Mac support, virus removal, data repair, technical support, FixMyTech
hero_subtitle: Professional technical assistance for all your digital devices and challenges.
environmental_title: Good for the environment and your wallet
environmental_description: By repairing and maintaining equipment instead of buying new, you contribute to sustainable development and reduce electronic waste. Our repairs extend the lifespan of equipment and save you unnecessary costs.
hardware_item_4: Data recovery from damaged equipment
problem_virus_description: We remove all types of malicious software and ensure your system is safe.
problem_slow_pc_description: We optimize your system for faster performance and better efficiency.
problem_bluescreen_description: We diagnose the cause of system crashes and implement solutions.
problem_network_description: We solve Wi-Fi problems, network connections and Internet connections.
benefit_security_description: We ensure your system is protected against threats and vulnerabilities.
benefit_performance_description: We optimize your system for faster operation and better efficiency.
benefit_stability_description: We eliminate system crashes and unexpected errors for a reliable experience.
cta_banner_subtitle: Contact us for a non-binding offer!
how_we_work_subtitle: Our process is simple and efficient to ensure fast and technical support
step_contact_description: Tell us about your problem via the form on the contact page.
step_evaluation_description: We evaluate your request, normally within 24 hours, and provide an offer for a solution.
step_execution_description: After an approved offer, we solve the task via remote control or return the equipment after repair.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions and see how we can help you.
faq_question_1_title: My computer is very slow. What can be done?
faq_question_1_answer: A slow computer can be due to many things, from too little memory (RAM) to a full or old hard drive, and unnecessary software running in the background. We can diagnose the problem and suggest the best solution, which may be to upgrade to a faster SSD, increase memory, or clean up software to restore performance.
faq_question_2_title: I think I have a virus. Can you remove it?
faq_question_2_answer: Absolutely. We use advanced tools to identify and remove all types of malicious software, including viruses, spyware and ransomware. After removal, we also secure your system with updated security software to prevent future infections.
faq_question_3_title: The computer won't start. Are all my files lost?
faq_question_3_answer: Not necessarily. Even if the machine doesn't start, it's often possible to retrieve data from the hard drive. We can try to repair the startup problem, or we can safely transfer your files to a new computer or an external hard drive.
faq_question_4_title: The screen is broken / has no picture. Can it be fixed?
faq_question_4_answer: Yes, in most cases, broken or non-functioning screens can be repaired or replaced. This applies to everything from laptops and tablets to external screens. We will assess the damage and provide you with a cost estimate for repair, which is often a cheaper and more environmentally friendly alternative than buying new.
faq_question_5_title: What if you can't repair my equipment?
faq_question_5_answer: We perform a thorough diagnosis before starting the repair. If it turns out that the equipment cannot be repaired, or that the cost becomes too high, we will inform you of this. You can then choose to have the equipment returned at your own expense, or we can destroy it in a responsible manner for a small fee, as specified in our prices and terms.
price_highlight: 80% of all problems solved within one hour!
pricing_benefit_1: Payment only when problem is solved
pricing_additional_fee: Note: If you have sent equipment to us and we cannot repair it, you can choose to have it returned at the customer's expense or let us destroy it for a fee of 200,-
contact_form_subtitle: Get technical help quickly and easily
form_label_service_type: What can we help you with?
form_placeholder_message: Describe your challenge or need, e.g., 'PC won't start', or 'laptop is very slow'. Include details about equipment or error messages for faster support.
form_label_accept_terms: I have read and understood the terms and conditions

about_meta_description: Learn more about FixMyTech.no, our history, values, and commitment to providing professional IT repairs and software solutions.
about_meta_keywords: about us, FixMyTech, IT repairs, technical support, sustainability
about_hero_subtitle: We solve your technology problems with expertise and efficiency.
about_history_p1: FixMyTech.no aims to make repairs and maintenance simple and more affordable than buying new. We started with a simple idea: to help people get the most out of their devices without emptying their wallets or harming the environment. Our passion for technology and sustainability drives us to deliver solutions that keep your equipment in top condition.
about_history_p2: With a team of experienced technicians and a focus on customer satisfaction, we work to make technology simple and hassle-free for you.
about_values_subtitle: We are driven by core values that ensure we deliver the best solutions to our customers.
about_value_sustainability_description: We promote environmentally friendly solutions by repairing and reusing technology to reduce electronic waste.
about_value_quality_description: We deliver high-quality repairs and services to ensure your devices function optimally.
about_value_cost_description: We only charge you if we solve the agreed problem, so you can trust us to deliver results.
about_cta_subtitle: Contact us today for professional technical support and repairs!
privacy_meta_description: Read our privacy policy to understand how we collect and process personal data through the contact form and the use of cookies.
privacy_meta_keywords: privacy policy, privacy, data security, cookies, FixMyTech.no
privacy_hero_subtitle: How we process your personal data.
privacy_intro_text: We at FixMyTech.no take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have.
privacy_section1_p1: When you fill out the contact form on our website, we collect the following information:
privacy_section2_p1: We use the information you submit to:
privacy_section2_li3: Contact you via email for further dialogue
privacy_section2_p2: We use Formspree.io as a service to send contact forms. Your information is therefore securely sent via their service and is not stored on our websites.
privacy_section3_li1: We do not store your information on our servers.
privacy_section3_li2: The information is received as email and treated confidentially.
privacy_section3_li3: We never share your information with third parties, with the exception of Formspree as an intermediary service for contact and Google Analytics for analysis purposes (if you have consented to analytics cookies).
privacy_section4_li1: Request access to what personal data we have about you
privacy_section4_li2: Ask us to correct or delete information
privacy_section4_p2: Send an email to kontakt@fixmytech.no for privacy inquiries.
privacy_section5_p1: FixMyTech.no uses cookies to ensure the website functions optimally and to analyze user behavior. We use the following types of cookies:
privacy_section5_p_essential: These are necessary for the website to function, for example to manage navigation and the contact form. These cannot be deactivated.
privacy_section5_p_analytics: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymized data on how users navigate the website. This helps us improve the user experience. You can choose to not consent to these via our cookie banner.
privacy_section5_p_banner: You will see a cookie banner the first time you visit the website. Here you can accept all cookies, reject non-essential cookies, or customize your settings. Your choices are stored in your browser for one year or until you delete the cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time via the link in the footer.
privacy_section5_p_policy: Our use of cookies is in accordance with GDPR and the ePrivacy Directive. Below are details about the cookies we use:
privacy_table_row1_purpose: Analyze user behavior, such as which pages are visited and for how long
privacy_table_row2_purpose: Maintain your session on the website, for example when using the contact form
privacy_table_row2_storage: Deleted when you close the browser
privacy_warning_box: Please note that deactivating essential cookies may affect the website's functionality.
privacy_section6_p1: Do you have questions about privacy or wish to exercise your rights? Contact us at:
privacy_section7_p1: By using the contact form or accepting cookies, you agree that we process your information in accordance with this declaration. All service use is at your own risk, as described in our disclaimer under the form on the main page.
licenses_meta_description: License information for third-party resources used on FixMyTech.no, including Font Awesome and Google Fonts.
licenses_hero_subtitle: Information about third-party resources used on FixMyTech.no.
licenses_fa_p1: We use Font Awesome Free 6.4.0 for icons on our website. Font Awesome is licensed under the following terms:
licenses_fa_p5_more_info: More information can be found on Font Awesome's license page.
licenses_gfonts_p1: We use Poppins and Roboto fonts from Google Fonts. Both fonts are licensed under SIL Open Font License 1.1.
licenses_gfonts_p2: More information about these fonts can be found at:
licenses_formspree_p1: We use Formspree to handle our contact form. The service is provided by Formspree. See their terms of use for more information.
licenses_tools_p1: The following tools use specific JavaScript libraries and resources for functionality:
licenses_tool_ean_p2: JSZip for file archiving (MIT or GPLv3 License).
licenses_tool_qr_p1: qrcode.js for QR code generation (MIT License).
licenses_tool_qr_p2: jsQR for QR code reading (Apache-2.0 License).
licenses_tool_qr_p3: JSZip for file archiving (MIT or GPLv3 License).
licenses_tool_image_p1: heic2any for HEIC/HEIF conversion (MIT License, with LGPL-licensed dependencies).
licenses_tool_image_p2: Native browser APIs for most image processing operations.
licenses_tool_video_p1: @ffmpeg/ffmpeg for video conversion and processing (LGPL 2.1+ License).
licenses_tool_fileconverter_p1: @ffmpeg/ffmpeg for audio and video conversion (LGPL 2.1+ License).
licenses_contact_p1: If you have questions about the licenses or the use of third-party resources, contact us via the contact form.
terms_meta_description: Read our terms of use for FixMyTech.no's services, including technical support, repairs, and cloud storage.
terms_meta_keywords: terms of use, services, technical support, repairs, FixMyTech.no
terms_hero_subtitle: Rules and guidelines for the use of our services.
terms_intro_text: Welcome to FixMyTech.no. These terms of use ("Terms") regulate your use of our website and services, including technical support, repairs, and cloud storage. By using our services, you accept these terms in their entirety.
terms_section1_p1: FixMyTech.no offers technical support in the form of repair and maintenance of hardware and software. We reserve the right to change or discontinue services without prior notice.
terms_section2_li1: Providing correct and complete information when you use our services
terms_section2_li2: Ensuring that equipment sent to us is properly packaged to avoid damage during transport
terms_section2_li3: Accepting that the use of our services is at your own risk
terms_section3_p1: All prices are in NOK and include VAT where applicable. Payment is only made when the problem is solved, unless otherwise agreed.
terms_section3_p2: If equipment cannot be repaired, a fee of 200,- may apply for the destruction of the equipment if you do not want it returned.
terms_section3_p3: Cost for shipping and return is charged to the customer.
terms_section4_p1: FixMyTech.no is not responsible for damage to equipment or problems that may arise during repair, setup or other services. We do not guarantee that the services will be error-free or meet your expectations.
terms_section5_p1: We process your personal data in accordance with GDPR and our privacy policy.
terms_section5_p2: Please read the privacy policy for more information on how we handle your data.
terms_section6_p1: We may update these terms at any time. The latest version will be available on this page.
terms_section7_p1: You can cancel a service before work begins at no cost. Refunds are not available after work has been performed, unless otherwise agreed in writing.
terms_section8_p1: If you have questions about these terms, contact us at kontakt@fixmytech.no.
